function 4

msg.inputType = 2; // Object type (e.g., Analog Input)
msg.bacnetId = 1; // Object instance number

name: function 5
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.temperatureIndoor.toFixed(1); // Convert to one decimal place
return msg;

name: Read from sqlite database
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT ID, strftime('%d-%m-%Y %H:$M:$S', TimeStamp / 1000, 'unixepoch', 'localtime') As LocalTime, Tag1, Tag2 FROM Modbus_data_1 order by LocalTime DESC Limit 1;";
return msg;

name: Read from sqlite database
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT ID, name, age FROM users;";
return msg;
